description: A delicious biscuit base filled with Dulce De Leche, topped with sliced bananas and smothered in whipped cream and grated chocolate!
name: Banana Toffee Tart Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 cup dulce de leche (more if you want)
1 cup grated chocolate, shredded coconut, or nuts for topping

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium bowl, stir together crumbs, sugar and melted butter until combined and moistened. Use your fingertips to press and mould the mixture into the bottom and up the sides of a 9 inch pie pan to form an even layer.Cover with plastic wrap and chill in fridge for at least an hour until firm, or bake the crust for 5 minutes in an oven at 175Â° to make it crispier, and cool before filling.
Spread the Dulce de Leche on top of the crust and smooth.
Slice the bananas and lay them over the dulce de leche in an even layer.
Whisk together the cream, sugar and vanilla extract until soft peaks form. Try not to overbeat. Spread whipped cream over bananas.
Sprinkle with grated chocolate, coconut or nuts. Refrigerate for at least 3 hours before serving. The pie will keep for up to 3 days in the fridge.
